gov.va.isaac.interfaces.gui.views.commonFunctionality

Interface ConceptViewI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EmbeddableViewI, IsaacViewI
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    PopupConceptViewI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConceptView, EnhancedConceptView

    @Contract
public interface ConceptViewI
extends EmbeddableViewI
    ConceptViewI An interface that requests a window that displays the details of a concept.
    Author:
    Dan Armbrust
